component.name: TCPU
component.version: CMO内部使用，商用发布不用关注，设备不会显示

features.feature: 本次更新主要针对系统进行优化，推荐您进行更新。
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”“荣耀俱乐部”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。
This recommended update includes system optimizations for your device.

1. Installing this update will not erase your personal data, but we recommend that you back up any important data before proceeding. 2. For more introductions to product features, please visit the "Tips" app. 3. Please visit the "My HONOR" or "HONOR Club" app for issues. You can also visit the official Honor website at https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us for assistance.
